title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Plaid Print Casual Cotton Buttoned Cardigan Sweater, Plaid Knitted Cropped Cardigan Sweater

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #328,756 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,012 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT as it appears or stated
items.body: States cotton, but it’s polyester spandex Appears blue peach, it’s orange teal Read more
items.author: Jana G.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap-looking
items.body: Cheap-looking print and fabric. The colors are not vibrant. The pattern is somehow just on top of the fabric, and not actually part of the cloth. In addition, the size I got looks like a men's sweater, not a women's. Read more
items.author: NX-O1

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits very large
items.body: The sizing is way off. I ordered a medium and it fits like a men's large. The colors are nice but the fabric is not sweater material like you would expect from a cardigan. Its still a nice looking shirt, but not what I expected. Read more
items.author: Pam Knauer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars this material is crap and the picture was very misleading
items.body: this is the ugliest so-called sweater I have ever seen in my life I didn't even wanna try it on. It's made out of this fake material and it was shown as being like a fabric of wall or cotton. Read more
items.author: Kathy B.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: This picture is so misleading! The color is off and the medium fits like an extra large! It’s a nylon material not sweater like the picture would indicate. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just don’t buy this
items.body: This is just not at all what is described or pictured in the listing. The colors are different and it literally feels like a cheap hockey jersey. Do not buy this. Thank god I opened it instead of just wrapping it up for my mom for Christmas because I would’ve been horrified Read more
items.author: Scout Rasmussen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Great
items.body: Cozy and cute, office and casual friendly Read more
items.author: Maria

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
